trans-unit.source: Provides the <xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref> base class for a strongly typed collection.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref uid="langword_csharp_abstract" name="abstract" href=""></xref>基类的强类型集合。

trans-unit.source: A CollectionBase instance is always modifiable.
trans-unit.target: CollectionBase 实例始终是可修改的。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase> for a read-only version of this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>此类的只读版本</xref:System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase>，请参阅

trans-unit.source: The capacity of a CollectionBase is the number of elements the CollectionBase can hold.
trans-unit.target: CollectionBase 的容量是 CollectionBase 能够容纳的元素数。

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to a CollectionBase, the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation.
trans-unit.target: 当元素添加到 CollectionBase 时，自动增加容量通过重新分配所需的方式。

trans-unit.source: The capacity can be decreased by setting the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Capacity%2A> property explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置减少容量<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Capacity%2A>属性显式。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Capacity%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> class with the default initial capacity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>类具有默认初始容量。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of a <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> can hold.
trans-unit.target: 容量<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>是元素的数目，<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>可以容纳。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> </xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to a <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>, the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array.
trans-unit.target: 如元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>时调整操作

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> class with the specified capacity.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>具有指定容量的类。

trans-unit.source: The capacity of a <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> can hold.
trans-unit.target: 容量<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>是元素的数目，<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>可以容纳。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> </xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: As elements are added to a <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>, the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array.
trans-unit.target: 如元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>，自动增加容量通过重新分配在内部数组所需的方式。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需执行大量的大小将元素添加到<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>时调整操作

trans-unit.source: This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is `capacity`.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是`capacity`。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements that the new list can initially store.
trans-unit.target: 新列表最初可以存储的元素数。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of elements that the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> can contain.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元素的数目<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>可以包含。

trans-unit.source: Capacity is the number of elements that the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> can store.
trans-unit.target: 容量是元素的数目，<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>可以存储。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> is the number of elements that are actually in the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>是其实是<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>的元素的数目</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Capacity is always greater than or equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 容量始终是大于或等于<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> exceeds Capacity while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>添加元素时超过容量，通过在复制旧元素和添加新的元素之前重新分配在内部数组自动增加容量。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: The capacity can be decreased by setting the Capacity property explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过显式设置的容量属性减小该容量。

trans-unit.source: When the value of Capacity is set explicitly, the internal array is also reallocated to accommodate the specified capacity.
trans-unit.target: 当显式设置的容量的值时，在内部数组也会重新分配以适应指定的容量。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the new capacity.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值的运算 o （1）;将属性设置为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`新容量。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements that the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> can contain.
trans-unit.target: 元素的数目， <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"> </xref>可以包含。

trans-unit.source: Capacity is set to a value that is less than <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count*>.
trans-unit.target: 容量设置为小于<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count*>.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count*>值

trans-unit.source: There is not enough memory available on the system.
trans-unit.target: 没有足够的内存可用系统上。

trans-unit.source: Removes all objects from the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 删除中的所有对象<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: This method cannot be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 不能重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> is set to zero.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>设置为零。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`为<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform custom actions before or after the collection is cleared, override the protected <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnClear%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnClearComplete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行自定义操作之前或之后清除的集合，重写受保护<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnClear%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnClearComplete%2A>方法。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnClearComplete%2A> </xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnClear%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取包含中的元素数<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能重写。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的元素数<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值是一个 o （1） 操作。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回的枚举数循环访问<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: [Visual Basic, C#] The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Basic、 C#] `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用`foreach`建议，而不是直接操作枚举数。

trans-unit.source: Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 枚举器可用于读取集合中中的数据，但它们不能用于修改基础集合。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 最初，枚举数定位在集合中的第一个元素之前。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>此外会回此位置的枚举数。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在此位置，调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>引发异常。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，你必须调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>的第一个元素的集合，然后再读取<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>的值枚举器向前移动</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>返回相同的对象之前<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>称为。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>设置<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>到下一个元素。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>越过的末尾的集合，枚举数定位在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> also return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 当枚举器位于此位置上，后续调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>还返回`false`。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果最后一次调用到<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>返回`false`，则调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>引发异常。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the first element of the collection again, you can call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>可以再次，集合的第一个元素调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>后, 跟<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> throws an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果对集合进行更改，如添加、 修改或删除元素，枚举数将失效下, 一个调用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>到

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果之间修改集合<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>返回到，设置的元素，即使枚举数已经无效。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举数没有对集合; 独占访问权因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: While the GetEnumerator method is not visible to COM clients by default, inheriting the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> class can expose it and can cause undesirable behavior in COM clients.
trans-unit.target: 未对 COM 客户端默认情况下可见的 GetEnumerator 方法时，继承<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>类可以公开它，并且可以在 COM 客户端导致意外行为。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: This method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 此方法为 o （1） 运算。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>为<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>实例。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Collections.ArrayList"> </xref>表示<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>实例本身。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值是一个 o （1） 操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IList> containing the list of elements in the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Collections.IList>包含中的元素列表<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>实例。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The On* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the List property, but not on the instance returned by the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.InnerList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 仅在列表属性中，返回的实例上但不是能在返回的实例调用 On * 方法<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.InnerList%2A>属性。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.InnerList%2A>

trans-unit.source: Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 检索此属性的值是一个 o （1） 操作。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IList>表示<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>实例本身。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes when clearing the contents of the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 当清除的内容时执行其他自定义进程<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.target: 此方法的默认实现需要通过执行一些操作之前清除集合的派生类中重写。

trans-unit.source: The On* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A> property, but not on the instance returned by the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.InnerList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 仅在返回的实例上调用 On * 方法<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A>属性，但不是能在返回的实例<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.InnerList%2A>属性。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.InnerList%2A> </xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the process fails, the collection reverts back to its previous state.
trans-unit.target: 如果进程失败，集合将恢复到以前的状态。

trans-unit.target: 仅在返回的实例上调用 On * 方法<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A>属性，但不是能在返回的实例<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.InnerList%2A>属性。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.InnerList%2A> </xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.List%2A>

trans-unit.source: Removes the element at the specified index of the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> instance.

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: 在由连续的元素，如列表，集合中移除的元素下面的元素的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。

trans-unit.source: This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶，如哈希表的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否访问<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>是同步的 （线程安全）。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> instance is not synchronized.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>实例不同步。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类可以提供的同步的版本<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>使用<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>属性。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> </xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/c3b5b435-5577-4ea3-8822-_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/c3b5b435-5577-4ea3-8822-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/c3b5b435-5577-4ea3-8822-_1.vb)] Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>在整个枚举期间︰ [!code-cpp [System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/c3b5b435-5577-4ea3-8822-_1.cpp)][!code-cs[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/c3b5b435-5577-4ea3-8822-_1.cs)][!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/c3b5b435-5577-4ea3-8822-_1.vb) ]检索此属性的值是一项 o （1） 操作。 </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取可以用于对访问进行同步的对象<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> using the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类可以提供自己的同步的版本<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>使用<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>属性。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> </xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> of the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>, not directly on the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>.
trans-unit.target: 同步代码必须在执行操作<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>的<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>，不是直接对<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> </xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保正确地执行操作的从其他对象派生的集合。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase> object.
trans-unit.target: 具体地说，这样可保持正确的同步，与可能同时对修改其他线程<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>对象。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改导致的异常。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array and copying the existing elements to the new array before the new element is added.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>已等于容量、 通过自动重新分配在内部数组并将现有的元素复制到新数组，然后才能添加新元素列表的容量加倍。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> is less than the capacity, this method is an O(1) operation.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>小于容量，此方法为 o （1） 运算。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果容量需要增加以容纳新元素，此方法会成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`为<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: Inserts an element into the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 将元素插入<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>的指定索引处。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A> already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>已等于容量、 通过自动重新分配在内部数组，才能插入新元素列表的容量加倍。</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `index` is equal to <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>, `value` is added to the end of <xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`index`等同于<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>，`value`添加到<xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>.</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase>末尾</xref:System.Collections.CollectionBase.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element.
trans-unit.target: 在集合中的连续元素，如列表，在插入点之后的元素将下移以容纳新元素。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。

trans-unit.source: This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table.
trans-unit.target: 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶，如哈希表的集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Collections.CollectionBase"></xref>具有固定的大小。

trans-unit.source: A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements.
trans-unit.target: 具有固定大小的集合不允许添加或移除元素后的集合在创建，但是允许修改现有元素。

trans-unit.source: A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: 具有固定大小的集合是只是一个集合的包装器防止添加和移除元素;因此，如果对基础集合，包括添加或移除元素，进行更改的固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created.
trans-unit.target: 集合是只读的不允许添加、 移除或修改元素的集合在创建后。

trans-unit.source: A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes.
trans-unit.target: 集合是只读的是只是一个集合与防止集合; 进行修改的包装因此，如果对基础集合进行更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。
